description: A multiswitched integer differential-type sequence designed to be mostly odd: two types of integer differential sequences are switched in a way that is made odd: 1) a(n)=2*a(n-1)-a(n-2); 2) a(n)=3*a(n-1)-3*a(n-2)+a(n-3); the one back versions are 3) a(n)=2*a(n-2)-a(n-3); 4) a(n)=3*a(n-2)-3*a(n-3)+a(n-4).
